Search Flights
{{ flight }}
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-search-flights', templateUrl: './search-flights.component.html', styleUrls: ['./search-flights.component.css'] }) export class SearchFlightsComponent implements OnInit { searchResults : any = [ "American Airlines", "British Airways", "Lufthansa" ] constructor(){} ngOnInit(): void { throw new Error('Method not implemented.'); } }
